mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Patient ( user_id, patient_code, birth, height, weight, blood_type, address, national_id, nearest_clinic, ec_first_name, ec_last_name, ec_relationship, ec_mobile_number, chief_complaint, allergies, past_medical_conditions, current_medications, past_surgical_history, family_history, social_history) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{patientCode}, #{birth}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bloodType}, #{address}, #{nationalId}, #{nearestClinic}, #{ecFirstName}, #{ecLastName}, #{ecRelationship}, #{ecMobileNumber}, #{chiefComplaint}, #{allergies}, #{pastMedicalConditions}, #{currentMedications}, #{pastSurgicalHistory}, #{familyHistory}, #{socialHistory})
